description.en: Founded in 2015, Cindicator builds analytical and trading products for stocks and crypto based on ‘Hybrid Intelligence’, which combines data from thousands of users and AI. Resulting indicators are available on Bloomberg terminals and in strategies by Stoic, an automated trading app that outperformed BTC and crypto benchmarks and is connected to accounts with nearly a hundred million dollar worth of crypto.

ico_data.short_desc: Hybrid Intelligence for Effective Asset Management
ico_data.description: Cindicator creates the social and technological infrastructure needed to make effective decisions under the conditions of the high uncertainty of the new economy. By combining a large number of diverse financial analysts and a set of machine-learning models into a single system, we are developing a Hybrid Intelligence infrastructure for the efficient management of investors’ capital in traditional financial and crypto-markets.

status_updates.description:
Save the date: 11 December, a major event for the CND ecosystem

Early next month we are going to release the details of one of the most important developments in the Cindicator ecosystem. 

Sign up on our homepage to be among the first to find out: https://cindicator.com

We're excited to share new opportunities for Cindicator analysts! New questions, more special contests, crowd of crowd experiments. Make regular forecasts, unlock the PRO status to join special contests and get a share of 2.5 million $CND prize fund. 

Start forecasting and get rewards in $CND https://cindicator.app.link/O44P0q7AP0

Read more about new opportunities for analysts http://bit.ly/31lFxcw
+228.8% profit by trading on Augur and Veil markets with Hybrid Intelligence indicators! Follow the link to read more about this experiment and results: http://bit.ly/2MJ9lL5

Yesterday we have distributed the rewards for Cindicator analysts: 2505469.375 $CND and 16.12952159 $ETH in total.
The new monthly competition has just started! Make forecasts every day, get at least 1 point, and receive your rewards in $CND at the end of the month: http://bit.ly/2J20KT1

We've launched Cindicator Edge, a new web app for receiving Hybrid Intelligence indicators. Just connect any Ethereum wallet to unlock up to 12 indicators a week! To receive more indicators in real-time, acquire $CND tokens directly in the app. 

Try it out now ➡ http://bit.ly/2LIzmd2

Yesterday we published a new analytical report covering crowd sentiment towards #Libra!

Read about the findings and download the full report: http://bit.ly/2lvKuR2

The new monthly competition has just started! Now everyone starts from scratch. Make forecasts every day, get at least 1 point, and receive the rewards in $CND at the end of the month.

Make a forecast now ➡ http://bit.ly/2lHh5Dl
